mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id AS userId, d.mobile AS userMobile, c.id AS friendId, c.nick_name AS nickName, c.pic AS pic, c.mobile AS friendMobile, a.care AS care FROM sst_user_friend AS a JOIN sport_user AS c ON c.id = a.friend_id AND c.stat = 1 JOIN sport_user AS d ON d.id = a.user_id AND d.stat = 1 WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.stat = 1

SELECT a.id, a.user_id AS userId,d.mobile AS userMobile, c.id AS friendId, c.nick_name AS nickName, c.pic AS pic, c.mobile AS friendMobile, a.care AS care FROM sst_user_friend AS a JOIN sport_user AS c ON c.id = a.friend_id AND c.stat = 1 JOIN sport_user AS d ON d.id = a.user_id AND d.stat = 1 WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.stat = 1 AND a.care = 1
SELECT a.mobile FROM sport_user a WHERE a.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM sst_group_user b WHERE b.group_id = #{groupId} AND b.stat = 1) AND a.stat = 1

SELECT a.id, a.email,a.mobile, a.nick_name as nickName,a.gender,a.utype,a.province,a.area, a.location, a.pic , a.last_login_time as lastLoginTime, a.last_update_time as lastUpdateTime, a.create_time as createTime, a.stat, a.birthday, b.id as teamId, b.name as teamName FROM sport_user a Left JOIN sst_team b ON a.team_id = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.stat = 1
